director.name: 小阿多弗·亚历克斯 Adolfo Alix Jr.

introduction: LV runs an illegal horse race betting outlet at home. Her eldest son Ace, who works as a sota (horse caretaker) is torn between pursuing an illegal arrangement with one of the trainors for a hefty sum of money. Daughter Daisy runs away from the police after entering into a deal with them. Bingo, the youngest, waits for his girlfriend to have sex with him after a bet with his friends.  What happens next is a raw and gritty drama of human survival.
